description: Metadata JSON document for adding information to orders.
title: AppData Root Schema

appCode.description: The code identifying the CLI, UI, service generating the order.
appCode.title: App Code

environment.description: Environment from which the order came from.
environment.title: Environment

metadata.description: Each metadata will specify one aspect of the order.
metadata.title: Metadata

signer.title: Signer
signer.description: The address of the trader who signs the CoW Swap order. This field should normally be omitted; it is recommended to use it if the signer is a smart-contract wallet using EIP-1271 signatures.

utmSource.title: UTM Source
utmSource.description: Tracks in which medium the traffic originated from (twitter, facebook, etc.)

utmMedium.title: UTM Medium
utmMedium.description: Tracks in which medium the traffic originated from (mail, CPC, social, etc.)

utmCampaign.title: UTM Campaign
utmCampaign.description: Track the performance of a specific campaign

utmTerm.title: UTM Keyword Term
utmTerm.description: Track which keyword term a website visitor came from

slippageBips.title: Slippage Bips
slippageBips.description: Slippage tolerance that was applied to the order to get the limit price. Expressed in Basis Points (BPS). One basis point is equivalent to 0.01% (1/100th of a percent)

hooks.title: Order interaction hooks
hooks.description: Optional Pre and Post order interaction hooks attached to a single order

pre.title: Pre-Hooks
pre.description: CoW Hooks to call before an order executes

target.title: Hook Target
target.description: The contract to call for the hook

callData.title: Hook CallData
callData.description: The calldata to use when calling the hook

gasLimit.title: Hook Gas Limit
gasLimit.description: The gas limit (in gas units) for the hook

post.title: Post-Hooks
post.description: CoW Hooks to call after an order executes

appCode.description: The code identifying the UI powering the widget
appCode.title: App Code

environment.description: Environment from which the order came from.
environment.title: Environment

bps.title: Basis Point (BPS)
bps.description: The fee in basis points (BPS) to be paid to the partner. One basis point is equivalent to 0.01% (1/100th of a percent)

recipient.title: Partner account
recipient.description: The Ethereum address of the partner to receive the fee.
